Generation V.Black: It can return to its Trainer's location regardless of the distance separating them.
Generation V.White: Many people believe that, deep in the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no war.
Generation V.Black 2: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets separated from its Trainer.
Generation V.White 2: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets separated from its Trainer.

Generation VI.X: Many people believe that, deep in the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no war.
Generation VI.Y: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets separated from its Trainer.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Many people believe that, deep in the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no war.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets separated from its Trainer.

Generation VIII.Sword: It can fly moderately quickly. No matter how far it travels, it can always find its way back to its master and its nest.
Generation VIII.Shield: These bright Pokémon have acute memories. Apparently delivery workers often choose them as their partners.
